actions.text: The House Committee on House Administration reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-39, by Mr. Frost.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 22.

official_title: Providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuing expenses of investigations and studies by certain committees of the House from April 1, 1993, through May 31, 1993.

summary.text: Makes available from the contingent fund of the House of Representatives amounts necessary for continuance of investigations and studies by the standing committees of the House, the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence, and the Joint Committee on the Organization of the Congress from April 1, 1993, through May 31, 1993.

titles.title: Providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for continuing expenses of investigations and studies by certain committees of the House from April 1, 1993, through May 31, 1993.
